project_plan.name: Basic Data Analysis on CSV File
project_plan.description: Develop a Python program that reads a CSV file and performs basic data analysis, including calculating and displaying the mean, median, and mode for specified numerical columns.

task.name: Set up the environment and import necessary libraries (e.g., pandas, numpy, statistics)
Implement a function to read the CSV file and validate the input
Implement a function to calculate the mean for specified numerical columns
Implement a function to calculate the median for specified numerical columns
Implement a function to calculate the mode for specified numerical columns
Implement user interactions to input the CSV file path and select numerical columns for analysis
Write tests to ensure the functions for mean, median, and mode work correctly
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
